channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samuel Adams’s parent company points to gains in light beer as tastes shift from craft brews
item.description: Boston Beer Co. says that the company faces long-term challenges.

item.title: Yes, this stock market is hard to predict — but it always is. Here’s what’s even harder.
item.description: It’s difficult to overcome “hindsight bias” — thinking that investing was easier than it really was.
